translation.title: Ninety Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Fragrant Heartwood Fairy

previous.name: Ten Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Fragrant Root Fairy

segments.en: 23–112. Ninety Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Fragrant Heartwood Fairy

segments.pli: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Seated to one side, that mendicant said to the Buddha:

segments.pli: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sāragandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ … pe …
segments.en: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of fairykind who live in fragrant heartwood …

segments.pli: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṃ carati, vācāya sucaritaṃ carati, manasā sucaritaṃ carati.
segments.en: “Mendicant, it’s when someone does good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
‘The gods of fairykind who live in fragrant scents are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’

segments.pli: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gandhagandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti.
segments.en: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the gods of fairykind who live in fragrant scents!’

segments.pli: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gandhagandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods of fairykind who live in fragrant scents.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gandhagandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of fairykind who live on fragrant scents.”

segments.pli: (Evaṃ piṇḍakena ekasatañca dvādasa ca suttantā honti.)

segments.en: The Linked Discourses on fairykind are completed.

suttaplex.blurb: Someone of good conduct and appropriate aspiration may be reborn as a fairy living in various kinds of vegetation if they give various gifts
